data.rationale:
Loans and similar instruments can be represented by an amortization
    table. Not only loans, but present value calculations, annuities,
    and probably other things all call for the same calculations. A
    module to wrap these up in one convenient place would be useful, at
    least to me.

    Finance::Loan does some similar calculations, but is misnamed and
    has hard-coded assumptions about payment periods. It also has an
    ugly interface and limited support for getting data out of the
    amortization.
